ChangeKey.label: Path
ChangeKey.hint: The system path of the change.

invalid.notAnItemUuid: UUID must be a valid Item UUID.
invalid.itemNotFound: Failed to find an Item with UUID "{uuid}".

ChangeReevaluateOnUpdate.label: Reevaluate on Update
ChangeReevaluateOnUpdate.hint: Whether to reevaluate this change on update.

ChangeAllowDuplicate.label: Allow Duplicate
ChangeAllowDuplicate.hint: Whether to allow duplicates of this item.

priority.label: Priority
priority.hint:
Affliction's are applied in batches based on their priority, from lowest to highest.
The system keeps all healing affliction at priority 0, and all damaging afflictions at priority 30, and in-between those numbers special cases are handled.

For homebrew content we recommend using these same numbers if your affliction is meant to be applied in the same batch as the system afflictions.

formula.label: Formula
formula.hint:
The result of this formula will be multiplied by the afflicted target's Max HP.
Example Input: "1/16" (this is 1 tick)

type.label: Type
type.hint: Whether this affliction's formula should be applied as damage or healing.

removeAfterCombat.label: Remove After Combat
removeAfterCombat.hint: Whether this effect should be removed after a combat encounter ends.

removeOnRecall.label: Remove On Recall
removeOnRecall.hint: Whether this effect should be removed when the actor is taken out of combat (without ending combat).

turns.label: Affl. Duration (Activations)
turns.hint:
The number of activations this affliction will last before it is automatically deleted.
Leave blank for afflictions that should persist indefinitely.

startTurn.label: Applied On Activation
startTurn.hint:
The Nth activation of the actor this affliction applies to, when the affliction was first applied.
Note: Generally should not be edited.

remaining.label: Remaining Activations
remaining.hint: The number of activations remaining before this affliction expires and is removed.

tint.label: Icon Tint Color
tint.hint: The color tint to apply to the effect icon.

disabled.label: Effect Suspended?
disabled.hint: Whether this effect is suspended and should not be applied.

origin.label: Effect Origin
origin.hint: The origin of the effect if any.

transfer.label: Transfer Effect?
transfer.hint: Whether this effect should apply to the actor holding this item (checked), or the item itself (unchecked).

Errors.UnableToSaveDueToValidationFailure: Unable to save changes due to validation failure(s). Please check the changes and resolve the issues.
Errors.ChangeSyntax: Syntax error in rule element definition: {message}

Delete.Title: Delete Clock
Delete.Message: Are you sure you want to delete clock: {label}?

Owner.Label: Owner
Owner.Hint: Drag actor here to transform this folder into a Party Folder

Team.Label: Team Members
Team.Hint: Drag actor here to transform this folder into a Team Folder

DevMode.Name: Developer Mode
DevMode.Hint: Enable developer mode, this will allow you to commit changes to the Github repository.

Traits.Name: Traits Settings
Traits.Label: Open Menu
Traits.Hint: Manage Traits available in the System
Traits.Title: Traits Settings

systemTraits.Label: System Traits
systemTraits.Hint:
These traits are defined by the system itself and can therefore not be deleted.
You can however override the properties by declaring a User Trait with the same name.

Please keep in mind that any attached automation to traits will not adhere to overriden core traits.

userTraits.Label: User Traits
userTraits.Hint:
Custom traits defined by the Game Master.

If a trait with the same name as a system trait is defined here, it will override the system trait.

moduleTraits.Label: Module Traits
moduleTraits.Hint: Traits added through a module, they cannot be edited by Game Masters.

hp.Label: Hit Points
hp.Hint: The number of hit points the actor has.

atk.Label: Attack
atk.Hint: The attack bonus of the actor.

def.Label: Defense
def.Hint: The defense bonus of the actor.

spa.Label: Special Attack
spa.Hint: The special attack bonus of the actor.

spd.Label: Special Defense
spd.Hint: The special defense bonus of the actor.

Combatant.InitiativeNotZeroOrNull: Initiative must be a number that is 0 or more.

slug.label: Slug
slug.hint: The slug is a unique identifier for this entity.

description.label: Description
description.hint: A brief description of the effect.

container.label: Container
container.hint: The container item in which this item is stored

target.label: Target
target.hint: The type of targets this action can affect.

distance.label: Range Band
distance.hint: The RIP distance of the action.

unit.label: Unit
unit.hint: The measurement unit of the Action.

activationCost.label: Action Cost
activationCost.hint: The action cost to activate the Action.

powerPoints.label: PP Cost
powerPoints.hint: The number of Power Points the Action uses up when activated.

trigger.label: Trigger
trigger.hint: The trigger of the Action. (if any)

delay.label: Delay
delay.hint: The delay value of the Action. (if any)

priority.label: Priority
priority.hint: The priority value of the Action. (if any)

pokemonType.label: Elemental Type
pokemonType.hint: The Elemental Type of the Entity.
pokemonType.hintPlural: The Elemental Types of this Entity.

pokemonNumber.label: Number
pokemonNumber.hint: The National Dex ID of the Pokemon.

captureRate.label: Capture Rate
captureRate.hint: The Capture Rate of the Pokemon.

category.label: Size Category
category.hint: The Size Category of the Pokemon.

type.label: Measurement Type
type.hint: The Measurement Type of the Pokemon.

height.label: Height
height.hint: The Height of the Pokemon in Meters.

weight.label: Weight
weight.hint: The Weight of the Pokemon in Kilos.

genderRatio.label: Gender Ratio
genderRatio.hint: Gender Ratio in 8ths chance of being Male, -1 if genderless.

eggGroups.label: Egg Groups
eggGroups.hint: The Egg Groups of the Pokemon.

starting.label: Starting Abilities
starting.hint: The Abilities the Pokemon starts with.

basic.label: Basic Abilities
basic.hint: The Basic Abilities the Pokemon can learn.

advanced.label: Advanced Abilities
advanced.hint: The Advanced Abilities the Pokemon can learn.

master.label: Master Abilities
master.hint: The Master Abilities the Pokemon can learn.

id.label: Clock ID
id.hint: The unique identifier of the clock.

value.label: Clock Value
value.hint: The current value of the clock.

max.label: Clock Max
max.hint: The maximum value of the clock.

AccuracyRoll.Label: Accuracy Roll
AccuracyRoll.Hint: The roll to determine if the attack hits.

AdjustedStages.Label: Adjusted Stages
AdjustedStages.Hint: The combined accuracy stages of the attacker, and evasion stages of the defender. (max 6, min -6)

attack.Label: Attack
attack.Hint: The appropriate attack bonus of the attacker.

defense.Label: Defense
defense.Hint: The appropriate defense bonus of the defender.

critical.Label: Critical
critical.Hint: 1.5 if crit, 2 if crit and sniper ability, otherwise 1.

CommitToGithub.Label: Commit to Github
CommitToGithub.Hint: Commit the current changes to the Github repository.

Dialog.DeleteDocumentContent: Are you sure you want to delete: {name}?
